mdRecord.dcterms:title: The poetical works of Gavin Douglas, bishop of Dunkeld: with memoir, notes, and glossary / by John Small
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Douglas, Gawin, 1474?-1522
Small, John, 1828-1886
Vegio, Maffeo, 1406 or 1407-1458
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 4 v. fronts. (v. 1-3) illus., pl., facsims. 21 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: v. 1. Biographical introduction: Account of the writings of Bishop Gavin Douglas. Notices of the manuscripts and printed editions of the works of Bishop Gavin Douglas. The palice of honour. King Hart. Conscience. Notes and various readings.--v. 2-4. Translation of Virgil [The XIII. bukes of Eneados of the famose poete Virgill] Notes and various readings. Glossary.
With facsimile reproductions of original title-pages.
Book XIII. of the Eneados in a translation of Mapheus Vegius.
ALDERMAN: V.1: One copy: Photocopy. North Manchester, IN : Heckman Bindery, Inc., [2005].
Item X004938149 has bookplate data: Thomas Randolph Price.
